cam72cam.mod.block

Class BlockTypeEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • cam72cam.mod.block.BlockType
      • cam72cam.mod.block.BlockTypeEntity

  • public abstract class BlockTypeEntity
extends BlockType
    Extension to BlockType that integrates with BlockEntities. Most if not all of the functions exposed are now redirected to the block entity (break/pick/etc...)
